name: Steenee

evolution.description: Steenee can evolve into Tsareena at the time it learns Stomp. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 14 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Fruit Pokémon. It’s protected by its hard sepals, so it plays with bird Pokémon without worry. They peck it relentlessly, but it doesn’t care.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer from any negative status ailments in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Any ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is immune to the sleep condition.
